    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void adjustPositionY()
      When player object collides with tiles on Y axis (basically when it is walking on the ground), adjust Y position to be exactly
      private void boostPlayerLeft()
      Boosts the player speed by a factor of 1.5 if going left, otherwise slows down by factor of 0.66 Only works once per boost platform
      private void boostPlayerRight()
      Boosts the player speed by a factor of 1.5 if going right, otherwise slows down by factor of 0.66 Only works once per boost platform
      private void calcCollisionTimeX()
      Calculates the exact time it took the player object to collide with the tile object on x axis Player object might overlap the collided object, this calculates exact time it takes to collide without overlap
      private void calcCollisionTimeY()
      Calculates the exact time it took the player object to collide with the tile object on y axis Player object might overlap the collided object, this calculates exact time it takes to collide without overlap
      private void checkCollisionX()
      When player object collides with a wall horizontally, player dies
      void draw(android.graphics.Canvas c)
      Draws the current state of the game onto c
      private void invertGravity()
      Inverts the gravity of the game to face upside down.
      private void jump()
      Sets the vertical velocity of the player to make a small jump.
      void load(int level)
      Loads the GameState and the a stage for the first use only
      void onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
      Manipulates the state of the game depending on incoming MotionEvents
      private void retry()
      Resets all changed values since the start of the level.
      void update(long deltaFrameTime)
      Updates the state of the game depending on the deltaFrameTime.

      • player_first_gravity_inAir

        private boolean player_first_gravity_inAir
        The player is allowed to do only one gravity change in the air until he hits the ground again. This variable keeps track of that.

      • GameState

        public GameState(android.content.Context context,
                 float density,
                 float screenWidth,
                 float screenHeight)
        Creates a new GameState instance
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the App to get resources
        density - Pixel density of the screen
        screenWidth - Width of the screen in pixel
        screenHeight - Heigth of the screen in pixel
        Since:
        0.1

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(long deltaFrameTime)
        Updates the state of the game depending on the deltaFrameTime. Handles collision detection, gravity, movement, ...
        Parameters:
        deltaFrameTime - The passed time since the last updated frame.
        Since:
        0.1

      • boostPlayerRight

        private void boostPlayerRight()
        Boosts the player speed by a factor of 1.5 if going right, otherwise slows down by factor of 0.66 Only works once per boost platform
        Since:
        0.1

      • boostPlayerLeft

        private void boostPlayerLeft()
        Boosts the player speed by a factor of 1.5 if going left, otherwise slows down by factor of 0.66 Only works once per boost platform
        Since:
        0.1

      • adjustPositionY

        private void adjustPositionY()
        When player object collides with tiles on Y axis (basically when it is walking on the ground), adjust Y position to be exactly
        Since:
        0.1

      • checkCollisionX

        private void checkCollisionX()
        When player object collides with a wall horizontally, player dies
        Since:
        0.1

      • calcCollisionTimeX

        private void calcCollisionTimeX()
        Calculates the exact time it took the player object to collide with the tile object on x axis Player object might overlap the collided object, this calculates exact time it takes to collide without overlap
        Since:
        0.1

      • calcCollisionTimeY

        private void calcCollisionTimeY()
        Calculates the exact time it took the player object to collide with the tile object on y axis Player object might overlap the collided object, this calculates exact time it takes to collide without overlap
        Since:
        0.1

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas c)
        Draws the current state of the game onto c
        Parameters:
        c - The Canvas that is drawed onto
        Since:
        0.1

      • invertGravity

        private void invertGravity()
        Inverts the gravity of the game to face upside down. Also marks the player to be in air Only works if player is not in air when method call happens
        Since:
        0.1

      • jump

        private void jump()
        Sets the vertical velocity of the player to make a small jump. Also marks the player to be in air Only works if player is not in air when method call happens
        Since:
        0.1

      • onTouchEvent

        public void onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        Manipulates the state of the game depending on incoming MotionEvents
        Parameters:
        event - Incoming MotionEvent
        Since:
        0.1

      • load

        public void load(int level)
        Loads the GameState and the a stage for the first use only
        Parameters:
        level - The ID of the stage to be loaded. Starts with 0
        Since:
        0.1

      • retry

        private void retry()
        Resets all changed values since the start of the level. Restarts the stage
        Since:
        0.1
